```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(RCurl)
library(XML)
library(stringr)
```

### XML Extraction

```{r}
books_xml_raw <- getURL('https://raw.githubusercontent.com/zachalexander/data607_cunysps/master/Homework5/books.xml')

book_titles <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<title>.+>')
book_dt_pub <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<date_published>.+>')
book_famous_quote <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<famous_quote_from_book>.+>')
book_amazon <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<amazon_review_stars>.+>')
book_author_fn <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<first_name>.+>')
book_author_ln <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<last_name>.+>')
book_author_bp <- str_extract_all(books_xml_raw, '<birthplace>.+>')
```
